mapper.insert: insert into attach_product (pdUuid, pdFolder, pdName,pdPath,pdNum) values (#{pdUuid}, replace(#{pdFolder}, '\', '/'), #{pdName},replace(#{pdPath},'\', '/'),#{pdNum})
mapper.select: select * from attach_product where pdFolder = to_char(sysdate -1 ,'yyyy\mm\dd')
select * from attach_product a INNER join product_table p on a.pdNum = p.pdNum where a.pdNum = #{pdNum};
